mapper.select:
select a.id, a.customids, a.tomonthss, a.sales_lines, a.zyc_lines, a.cfy_lines, a.fcfy_lines, a.bjsp_lines, a.grflp_lines, a.ylqj_lines, a.spyl_lines, a.total, a.sales_amount, a.sales_goodsqty, a.customname from pub_monthly_sales a where a.customids is not null
and a.tomonthss between to_char(to_date (#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm') and to_char(to_date (#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-mm')
